definitions.definition: To give (someone or something) as a hostage to (someone or something else).
To hold (someone or something) hostage , especially in a way that constrains or controls the person or thing held, or in order to exchange for something else.

main_definition: ( possibly nonstandard ) To give (someone or something) as a hostage to (someone or something else).
secondary_definitions: ( possibly nonstandard ) To hold (someone or something) hostage , especially in a way that constrains or controls the person or thing held, or in order to exchange for something else.
